shortdesc.ph: Occurs when the state of the RTMP or RTMPS streaming changes.

section.p: This callback returns the result of calling the or method by the local user. When the RTMP/RTMPS streaming status changes, the SDK will trigger the callback, and the URL address where the status has changed and the current streaming status are specified in the callback. This callback indicates the state of the RTMP or RTMPS streaming. When exceptions occur, you can troubleshoot issues by referring to the detailed error descriptions in the errCode parameter.

plentry.pd: For the current push status, see for details. When the push status is (4), you can view the returned error information in the errorCode parameter.
Error codes of the RTMP or RTMPS streaming.
